Komachi moves forward and delivers a quick slashing attack with her sword, pushing the opponent away from her. She then leaps high into the air above the opponent and removes the ornamental [[Senbon|needles]] in her hair before throwing them downward in a fast-moving barrage. This technique lands a fairly large number of hits upon the opponent and also inflicts severe damage.

[[es:Bombardeo de Agujas del Cielo]]
[[fr:Barrage d'Aiguille Céleste]]
[[pl:Zapora Niebiańskich Igieł]]
